ivardefs.name: amount
ivardefs.desc: The amount sent to the payee.

ivardefs.name: created
ivardefs.desc: The date when this resource was created.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: A unique identifier assigned to this payment notice.

ivardefs.name: payee
ivardefs.desc: The party who will receive or has received payment that is the subject of this notification.

ivardefs.name: payment
ivardefs.desc: A reference to the payment which is the subject of this notice.

ivardefs.name: paymentDate
ivardefs.desc: The date when the above payment action occurred.

ivardefs.name: paymentStatus
ivardefs.desc: A code indicating whether payment has been sent or cleared.

ivardefs.name: provider
ivardefs.desc: The practitioner who is responsible for the services rendered to the patient.

ivardefs.name: recipient
ivardefs.desc: The party who is notified of the payment status.

ivardefs.name: request
ivardefs.desc: Reference of resource for which payment is being made.

ivardefs.name: response
ivardefs.desc: Reference of response to resource for which payment is being made.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of the resource instance.

properties.desc: This resource provides the status of the payment for goods and services rendered, and the request and response resource references.
